entry_requirements_raw.SPM:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter
entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Direct Entry to 3rd Year University.  A sophomore transfer applicant must also have either: completed (or be expected to complete) at least 1 year (2 regular semesters) and earned at least 25% of the credits required to complete a bachelor degree at a university inside or outside Korea; or, graduated ( or be expected to graduate) from a 2-year or 3-year college inside or outside Korea
A junior transfer applicant must also have either: completed (or be expected to complete) at least 2 years (4 regular semesters) and earned (or be expected to earn) at least 50% of the credits required to complete a bachelor degree at a university inside or outside Korea; or, graduated ( or be expected to graduate) from a 2-year or 3-year college inside or outside Korea
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter

UEC.text:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter

Diploma.text:
Direct Entry to 3rd Year University.  A sophomore transfer applicant must also have either: completed (or be expected to complete) at least 1 year (2 regular semesters) and earned at least 25% of the credits required to complete a bachelor degree at a university inside or outside Korea; or, graduated ( or be expected to graduate) from a 2-year or 3-year college inside or outside Korea
A junior transfer applicant must also have either: completed (or be expected to complete) at least 2 years (4 regular semesters) and earned (or be expected to earn) at least 50% of the credits required to complete a bachelor degree at a university inside or outside Korea; or, graduated ( or be expected to graduate) from a 2-year or 3-year college inside or outside Korea

STPM.text:
Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea

Completed studies in MOE approved high school.  For Direct Dongseo University programme, student must have as follows
The applicant and both of his/her parents must be citizens of a country other than Korea
The applicant must also have graduated from a high school inside or outside Korea
Student must have 3 years of school result and high school completion letter
For APU U-Start programme, student must have as follow
5 Credits (Grade C & above) in at least 5 subjects at IGCSE/ O-Levels
